matched.actualTitle: XML External Entity (XXE) Injection in SOAP Service - File Read
matched.matchReason: Both findings identify the same XXE vulnerability in the SOAP service endpoint. The expected finding references unsafe XML parsing configuration with resolve_entities=True at app.py lines 156-157, and the actual finding confirms this exact vulnerability with proof-of-concept demonstrating file read capability through DOCTYPE external entity injection. Both describe the same attack vector (XXE) with identical impact (file disclosure, SSRF, DoS).
